fr.unilim.javance.projet.sync
Class SyncAdapter

java.lang.Object
  AbstractThreadedSyncAdapter
      fr.unilim.javance.projet.sync.SyncAdapter

public class SyncAdapter
extends AbstractThreadedSyncAdapter

An AbstractThreadedSyncAdapter implementation This class is called directly by Android system when a sync is performed or needed. It's initialized at the first use of the application and called whenever it's needed. This works directly with a content provider (GTasksContentProvider) and uses the GoogleAccountHandler class to handle the account on which we have to perform a sync.

Author:
Thibault Desmoulins, Yorick Lesecque
See Also:
AbstractThreadedSyncAdapter, GoogleAccountHandler, RemoteManager, GTasksContentProvider

Constructor Detail

SyncAdapter

public SyncAdapter(Context context,
                   boolean autoInitialize)
The default constructor This function is called by the system at the first use of the application or at the initialization of the phone to register the sync adapter. It instantiates a GoogleAccountHandler to handle the account which we have to sync.

Parameters:
context - The context of the application
autoInitialize - A boolean declared in the syncadapter.xml (default to true)
See Also:
Sync-adapter
Method Detail

onPerformSync

public void onPerformSync(Account account,
                          Bundle extras,
                          java.lang.String authority,
                          ContentProviderClient provider,
                          SyncResult syncResult)
Overrides onPerformSync from AbstractThreadedSyncAdapter. This method is called by Android system whenever it's needed:
  • Sync is performed
  • onStatusChanged() is fired
  • Internet connection was activated
  • ...

    • Parameters:
    account - The account for which the sync is performed
    extras - A bundle in which we can store information
    authority - A string containing the syncadapter authority
    provider - The ContentProviderClient used to manage the DB of the application
    syncResultat - A helper to handle the current and futures sync
    See Also:
    ContentProvider

    performDiff

    private void performDiff(java.util.ArrayList<Folder> folders)
                  throws RemoteException
    Function used to perform the diff between the remote DB and the local one. Called when all Folders and Tasks have been caught from the remote server.

    Parameters:
    folders - An ArrayList of Folders containing all folders of the remote server.
    Throws:
    RemoteException - Exception thrown by the use of the ContentProviderClient

    handleException

    private void handleException(java.lang.Exception e,
                             SyncResult syncResult)
    A simple function to handle exceptions that can be thrown during the sync.

    Parameters:
    e - The exception thrown
    syncResult - The helper for sync

    public GoogleAccountHandler getGAHandler()

    onFoldersReceived

    public void onFoldersReceived(java.util.ArrayList<Folder> allFolders)
                       throws RemoteException
    Function used to launch the update process This function is fired by the RemoteManager when all Folders where caught from the remote server.

    Parameters:
    allFolders - All folders contained in the remote DB
    Throws:
    RemoteException - Exception thrown by the use of the ContentProviderClient
